works.description: Over 150,000 people have already seen the beautiful Whaletone piano within last few days of Design Week in Milan. Created by the Polish designer Robert Majkut, the Whaletone is a professional musical instrument for individualists, which resembles a giant whale emerging slowly from the water. The whole story started when Robert Majkut dreamt of a grand piano that was entirely different from the rest and dared to question the classic notion of the instrument. The designer followed his dream over the time and the upshot was the drop-dead-gorgeous Whaletone piano.
